mc.flavorText:
"Once you create perfection, what else is there to make?"
--Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist

Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature in play named Relentless Rats.

mc.printedText:
Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature in play named Relentless Rats.
A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.

Juggernaut attacks each turn if able.
Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.
mc.printedText:
Juggernaut attacks each turn if able.
Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.
mc.flavorText: Built with neither a way to steer nor a way to stop, the juggernauts were simply aimed at an enemy's best defenses and told to charge.

mc.name: Sculpting Steel

mc.printedText: As Sculpting Steel comes into play, you may choose an artifact in play. If you do, Sculpting Steel comes into play as a copy of that artifact.
mc.flavorText: An artificer once dropped one in a vault full of coins. She has yet to find it.

mc.name: Legacy Weapon
mc.oracleText:
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Remove target permanent from the game.
If Legacy Weapon would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Legacy Weapon and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.
mc.printedText:
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Remove target permanent from the game.
If Legacy Weapon would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Legacy Weapon and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Double the amount of each type of mana in your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: The cube's surface is pockmarked with jagged runes that seem to shift when unobserved.

mc.name: Citanul Flute
mc.oracleText: {X}, {T}: Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: {X}, {T}: Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: Each note of the flute mimics the call of a different beast.

mc.name: Dreamborn Muse
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand.
mc.flavorText:
"Her voice is insight, piercing and true."
--Ixidor, reality sculptor

mc.name: Pariah
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.
mc.flavorText:
"Why would I consider penance for my actions when I have so many subjects willing to do it for me?"
--Lord Konda

mc.name: Avatar of Might
mc.oracleText:
If an opponent controls at least four more creatures than you, Avatar of Might costs {6} less to play.
Trample (If this creature would deal enough combat damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player.)
mc.printedText:
If an opponent controls at least four more creatures than you, Avatar of Might costs {6} less to play.
Trample (If this creature would deal enough combat damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player.)
mc.flavorText: In their most desperate hour, the elves of Llanowar had one song left to sing.

mc.name: Denizen of the Deep
mc.oracleText: When Denizen of the Deep comes into play, return each other creature you control to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: When Denizen of the Deep comes into play, return each other creature you control to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: According to merfolk legend, a denizen of the deep swallows the horizon at the end of each day, bringing on the cold blanket of night.

mc.name: Root Maze
mc.oracleText: Artifacts and lands come into play tapped.
mc.printedText: Artifacts and lands come into play tapped.
mc.flavorText: Pause for the briefest of moments to consider the whorl of brambles, the tangled twist of bark, and the maze has already won.

mc.name: Rootwater Matriarch
mc.oracleText: {T}: Gain control of target creature as long as that creature is enchanted.
mc.printedText: {T}: Gain control of target creature as long as that creature is enchanted.
mc.flavorText: In the harsh depths of Rootwater, the charms of surface dwellers are quite useless . . . except as lures.

mc.name: The Hive
mc.oracleText: {5}, {T}: Put a 1/1 Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wasp into play. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: {5}, {T}: Put a 1/1 Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wasp into play. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.flavorText:
"Their buzzing makes my bones hum from a mile away."
--Galenti, treasure hunter

mc.printedText: {X}: Chimeric Staff becomes an X/X Construct artifact creature until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The staff unraveled in a chaotic chorus of clanging, becoming an improbable beast of hissing blades.

mc.name: Head Games
mc.oracleText: Target opponent puts the cards from his or her hand on top of his or her library. Search that player's library for that many cards. The player puts those cards into his or her hand, then shuffles his or her library.
mc.printedText: Target opponent puts the cards from his or her hand on top of his or her library. Search that player's library for that many cards. The player puts those cards into his or her hand, then shuffles his or her library.

mc.name: Graveborn Muse
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
mc.flavorText:
"Her voice is damnation, unyielding and certain."

mc.name: Field Marshal
mc.oracleText: Other Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and have first strike. (They deal combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
mc.printedText: Other Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and have first strike. (They deal combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
mc.flavorText: He is the only one who sees the patterns in the overlapping maps and conflicting reports.

mc.name: Mortal Combat
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if twenty or more creature cards are in your graveyard, you win the game.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if twenty or more creature cards are in your graveyard, you win the game.
mc.flavorText: The crowd roared, the fighters bled, and the dead piled high in the pits. Only the Cabal could win.

mc.name: Hurkyl's Recall
mc.oracleText: Return all artifacts target player owns to his or her hand.
mc.printedText: Return all artifacts target player owns to his or her hand.
mc.flavorText: Hurkyl's research at the College of Lat-Nam wasn't enough to stop the two brothers, but for centuries thereafter her spellcraft taught artificers restraint.

mc.name: Cephalid Constable

mc.printedText: Whenever Cephalid Constable deals combat damage to a player, return up to that many target permanents that player controls to their owners' hands.

mc.printedText: Beacon of Destruction deals 5 damage to target creature or player. Shuffle Beacon of Destruction into its owner's library.

mc.name: Enormous Baloth
mc.flavorText: Its diet consists of fruits, plants, small woodland animals, large woodland animals, woodlands, fruit groves, fruit farmers, and small cities.
